title: Workshop on Applying Human Performance Improvement (HPI) in K-12 Educational Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic curriculum design concepts, no experience with VR simulations
context.additional_context: A process for working professionals with elementary education experience to explore HPI methodology through collaborative autoethnography

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose performance issues in educational settings using the HPI 5-stage model: performance analysis, cause analysis, solution development, solution implementation, and evaluation.
Learners create portfolios sharing HPI application cases with peer practitioners using collaborative autoethnography.
Learners resolve conflict situations arising from HPI application in K-12 education with 80% accuracy through VR simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
